title: Keyboard navigation and accessibility
description: Ensure the app is fully accessible with keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and proper ARIA attributes. Meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
acceptance_criteria: All interactive elements focusable via Tab
Visible focus indicators (not just outline: none)
implementation_notes: Use semantic HTML (button, nav, main, etc.)
Headless UI provides good a11y defaults
Run axe-core or Lighthouse accessibility audit
